name: SwiftGenKit
summary: The SwiftGen framework responsible for parsing assets and turn them in a dictionary representation suitable for Stencil templates
description:
This pod contains asset parsers for
[SwiftGen](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/SwiftGen), as well as
methods for converting the data into contexts for
[Stencil](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/Stencil).
